But<S>1161</S> a certain<S>5100</S> man<S>435</S> named<S>3686</S> Ananias<S>367</S>, with<S>4862</S> Sapphira<S>4551</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, sold<S>4453</S> a possession<S>2933</S>,
And<S>2532</S> kept back<S>3557</S> part of<S>575</S> the price<S>5092</S>, his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S> also<S>2532</S> being privy<S>4894</S> to it, and<S>2532</S> brought<S>5342</S> a certain<S>5100</S> part<S>3313</S>, and laid<S>5087</S> it at<S>3844</S> the apostles'<S>652</S> feet<S>4228</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>2036</S>, Ananias<S>367</S>, why<S>1302</S> hath Satan<S>4567</S> filled<S>4137</S> thine<S>4675</S> heart<S>2588</S> <S>4571</S> to lie<S>5574</S> to the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> to keep back<S>3557</S> part of<S>575</S> the price<S>5092</S> of the land<S>5564</S>? <sup>to lie to: or, to deceive</sup>
Whiles it remained<S>3306</S>, was it not<S>3780</S> thine own<S>4671</S> <S>3306</S>? and<S>2532</S> after it was sold<S>4097</S>, was it not<S>5225</S> in<S>1722</S> thine own<S>4674</S> power<S>1849</S>? why<S>5101</S> <S>3754</S> hast thou conceived<S>5087</S> this<S>5124</S> thing<S>4229</S> in<S>1722</S> thine<S>4675</S> heart<S>2588</S>? thou hast<S>5574</S> not<S>3756</S> lied<S>5574</S> unto men<S>444</S>, but<S>235</S> unto God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Ananias<S>367</S> hearing<S>191</S> these<S>5128</S> words<S>3056</S> fell down<S>4098</S>, and gave up the ghost<S>1634</S>: and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> fear<S>5401</S> came<S>1096</S> on<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> them that heard<S>191</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the young men<S>3501</S> arose<S>450</S>, wound<S>4958</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>4958</S>, and<S>2532</S> carried him out<S>1627</S>, and buried<S>2290</S> him.
And<S>1161</S> it was<S>1096</S> about<S>5613</S> the space<S>1292</S> of three<S>5140</S> hours<S>5610</S> after<S>1292</S>, when<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, not<S>3361</S> knowing<S>1492</S> what was done<S>1096</S>, came in<S>1525</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> answered<S>611</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Tell<S>2036</S> me<S>3427</S> whether<S>1487</S> ye sold<S>591</S> the land<S>5564</S> for so much<S>5118</S>? And<S>1161</S> she said<S>2036</S>, Yea<S>3483</S>, for so much<S>5118</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> her<S>846</S>, How<S>5101</S> is it that<S>3754</S> ye<S>5213</S> have agreed together<S>4856</S> to tempt<S>3985</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>? behold<S>2400</S>, the feet<S>4228</S> of them which have buried<S>2290</S> thy<S>4675</S> husband<S>435</S> are at<S>1909</S> the door<S>2374</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall carry<S>1627</S> thee<S>4571</S> out<S>1627</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> fell she down<S>4098</S> straightway<S>3916</S> at<S>3844</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> yielded up the ghost<S>1634</S>: and<S>1161</S> the young men<S>3495</S> came in<S>1525</S>, and found<S>2147</S> her<S>846</S> dead<S>3498</S>, and<S>2532</S>, carrying her forth<S>1627</S>, buried<S>2290</S> her by<S>4314</S> her<S>846</S> husband<S>435</S>.
And<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> fear<S>5401</S> came<S>1096</S> upon<S>1909</S> all<S>3650</S> the church<S>1577</S>, and<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> as many as<S>3956</S> heard<S>191</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
And<S>1161</S> by<S>1223</S> the hands<S>5495</S> of the apostles<S>652</S> were<S>1096</S> many<S>4183</S> signs<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S> wrought<S>1096</S> <S>1096</S> among<S>1722</S> the people<S>2992</S>; (and<S>2532</S> they were<S>2258</S> all<S>537</S> with one accord<S>3661</S> in<S>1722</S> Solomon's<S>4672</S> porch<S>4745</S>.
And<S>1161</S> of the rest<S>3062</S> durst<S>5111</S> no man<S>3762</S> join himself<S>2853</S> to them<S>846</S>: but<S>235</S> the people<S>2992</S> magnified<S>3170</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> believers<S>4100</S> were<S>4369</S> the more<S>3123</S> added<S>4369</S> to the Lord<S>2962</S>, multitudes<S>4128</S> both<S>5037</S> of men<S>435</S> and<S>2532</S> women<S>1135</S>.)
Insomuch<S>5620</S> that they brought forth<S>1627</S> the sick<S>772</S> into<S>2596</S> the streets<S>4113</S>, and<S>2532</S> laid<S>5087</S> them on<S>1909</S> beds<S>2825</S> and<S>2532</S> couches<S>2895</S>, that<S>2443</S> at the least<S>2579</S> the shadow<S>4639</S> of Peter<S>4074</S> passing by<S>2064</S> might overshadow<S>1982</S> some<S>5100</S> of them<S>846</S>. <sup>into: or, in every street</sup>
<S>1161</S> There came<S>4905</S> also<S>2532</S> a multitude<S>4128</S> out of the cities<S>4172</S> round about<S>4038</S> unto<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, bringing<S>5342</S> sick<S>772</S> folks, and<S>2532</S> them which were vexed<S>3791</S> with<S>5259</S> unclean<S>169</S> spirits<S>4151</S>: and they<S>3748</S> were healed<S>2323</S> every one<S>537</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> the high priest<S>749</S> rose up<S>450</S>, and<S>2532</S> all they<S>3956</S> that were with<S>4862</S> him<S>846</S>, (which<S>3588</S> is<S>5607</S> the sect<S>139</S> of the Sadducees<S>4523</S>,) and were filled<S>4130</S> with indignation<S>2205</S>, <sup>indignation: or, envy</sup>
And<S>2532</S> laid<S>1911</S> their<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S> on<S>1909</S> the apostles<S>652</S>, and<S>2532</S> put<S>5087</S> them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the common<S>1219</S> prison<S>5084</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> by<S>1223</S> night<S>3571</S> opened<S>455</S> the prison<S>5438</S> doors<S>2374</S>, and<S>5037</S> brought<S>1806</S> them<S>846</S> forth<S>1806</S>, and said<S>2036</S>,
Go<S>4198</S>, stand<S>2476</S> and<S>2532</S> speak<S>2980</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S> to the people<S>2992</S> all<S>3956</S> the words<S>4487</S> of this<S>5026</S> life<S>2222</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when they heard<S>191</S> that, they entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S> early in the morning<S>5259</S> <S>3722</S>, and<S>2532</S> taught<S>1321</S>. But<S>1161</S> the high priest<S>749</S> came<S>3854</S>, and<S>2532</S> they that were with<S>4862</S> him<S>846</S>, and called<S>4779</S> the council<S>4892</S> together<S>4779</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the senate<S>1087</S> of the children<S>5207</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>, and<S>2532</S> sent<S>649</S> to<S>1519</S> the prison<S>1201</S> to have<S>71</S> them<S>846</S> brought<S>71</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when the officers<S>5257</S> came<S>3854</S>, and found<S>2147</S> them<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> the prison<S>5438</S>, they returned<S>390</S>, and<S>1161</S> told<S>518</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> The prison<S>1201</S> truly<S>3303</S> found we<S>2147</S> shut<S>2808</S> with<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> safety<S>803</S>, and<S>2532</S> the keepers<S>5441</S> standing<S>2476</S> without<S>1854</S> before<S>4253</S> the doors<S>2374</S>: but<S>1161</S> when we had opened<S>455</S>, we found<S>2147</S> no man<S>3762</S> within<S>2080</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> <S>5037</S> the high priest<S>2409</S> and<S>2532</S> the captain<S>4755</S> of the temple<S>2411</S> and<S>2532</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> heard<S>191</S> these<S>5128</S> things<S>3056</S>, they doubted<S>1280</S> of<S>4012</S> them<S>846</S> whereunto<S>5101</S> <S>302</S> this<S>5124</S> would grow<S>1096</S>.
Then came<S>3854</S> one<S>5100</S> and<S>1161</S> told<S>518</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> Behold<S>2400</S>, the men<S>435</S> whom<S>3739</S> ye put<S>5087</S> in<S>1722</S> prison<S>5438</S> are<S>1526</S> standing<S>2476</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> teaching<S>1321</S> the people<S>2992</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> went<S>565</S> the captain<S>4755</S> with<S>4862</S> the officers<S>5257</S>, and brought<S>71</S> them<S>846</S> without<S>3756</S> <S>3326</S> violence<S>970</S>: for<S>1063</S> they feared<S>5399</S> the people<S>2992</S>, lest<S>3363</S> they should have been stoned<S>3034</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when they had brought<S>71</S> them<S>846</S>, they set<S>2476</S> them before<S>1722</S> the council<S>4892</S>: and<S>2532</S> the high priest<S>749</S> asked<S>1905</S> them<S>846</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Did<S>3853</S> not<S>3756</S> we straitly<S>3852</S> command<S>3853</S> you<S>5213</S> that ye should<S>1321</S> not<S>3361</S> teach<S>1321</S> in<S>1909</S> this<S>5129</S> name<S>3686</S>? and<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, ye have filled<S>4137</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S> with your<S>5216</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>, and<S>2532</S> intend<S>1014</S> to bring<S>1863</S> this<S>5127</S> man's<S>444</S> blood<S>129</S> upon<S>1909</S> us<S>2248</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> and<S>2532</S> the other apostles<S>652</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, We ought<S>1163</S> to obey<S>3980</S> God<S>2316</S> rather<S>3123</S> than<S>2228</S> men<S>444</S>.
The God<S>2316</S> of our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> raised up<S>1453</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> slew<S>1315</S> and hanged<S>2910</S> on<S>1909</S> a tree<S>3586</S>.
Him<S>5126</S> hath God<S>2316</S> exalted<S>5312</S> with his<S>846</S> right hand<S>1188</S> to be a Prince<S>747</S> and<S>2532</S> a Saviour<S>4990</S>, for to give<S>1325</S> repentance<S>3341</S> to Israel<S>2474</S>, and<S>2532</S> forgiveness<S>859</S> of sins<S>266</S>.
And<S>2532</S> we<S>2249</S> are<S>2070</S> his<S>846</S> witnesses<S>3144</S> of these<S>5130</S> things<S>4487</S>; and<S>2532</S> so is also<S>1161</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, whom<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath given<S>1325</S> to them that obey<S>3980</S> him<S>846</S>.
When<S>1161</S> they heard<S>191</S> that, they were cut<S>1282</S> to the heart, and<S>2532</S> took counsel<S>1011</S> to slay<S>337</S> them<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> stood there up<S>450</S> one<S>5100</S> in<S>1722</S> the council<S>4892</S>, a Pharisee<S>5330</S>, named<S>3686</S> Gamaliel<S>1059</S>, a doctor of the law<S>3547</S>, had in reputation<S>5093</S> among all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S>, and commanded<S>2753</S> to put<S>4160</S> the apostles<S>652</S> forth<S>1854</S> a<S>5100</S> little space<S>1024</S>;
And<S>5037</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, Ye men<S>435</S> of Israel<S>2475</S>, take heed<S>4337</S> to yourselves<S>1438</S> what<S>5101</S> ye intend<S>3195</S> to do<S>4238</S> as touching<S>1909</S> these<S>5125</S> men<S>444</S>.
For<S>1063</S> before<S>4253</S> these<S>5130</S> days<S>2250</S> rose up<S>450</S> Theudas<S>2333</S>, boasting<S>3004</S> himself<S>1438</S> to be<S>1511</S> somebody<S>5100</S>; to whom<S>3739</S> a number<S>706</S> of men<S>435</S>, about<S>5616</S> four hundred<S>5071</S>, joined themselves<S>4347</S>: who<S>3739</S> was slain<S>337</S>; and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S>, as many as<S>3745</S> obeyed<S>3982</S> him<S>846</S>, were scattered<S>1262</S>, and<S>2532</S> brought<S>1096</S> to<S>1519</S> nought<S>3762</S>. <sup>obeyed: or, believed</sup>
After<S>3326</S> this man<S>5126</S> rose up<S>450</S> Judas<S>2455</S> of Galilee<S>1057</S> in<S>1722</S> the days<S>2250</S> of the taxing<S>582</S>, and<S>2532</S> drew away<S>868</S> much<S>2425</S> people<S>2992</S> after<S>3694</S> him<S>846</S>: he also<S>2548</S> perished<S>622</S>; and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S>, even as many as<S>3745</S> obeyed<S>3982</S> him<S>846</S>, were dispersed<S>1287</S>. <sup>obeyed: or, believed</sup>
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3569</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Refrain<S>868</S> from<S>575</S> these<S>5130</S> men<S>444</S>, and<S>2532</S> let<S>1439</S> them<S>846</S> alone<S>1439</S>: for<S>3754</S> if<S>1437</S> this<S>3778</S> counsel<S>1012</S> or<S>2228</S> this<S>5124</S> work<S>2041</S> be<S>5600</S> of<S>1537</S> men<S>444</S>, it will come to nought<S>2647</S>:
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> it be<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>, ye cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> overthrow<S>2647</S> it<S>846</S>; lest haply<S>3379</S> ye be found<S>2147</S> even<S>2532</S> to fight against God<S>2314</S>.
And<S>1161</S> to him<S>846</S> they agreed<S>3982</S>: and<S>2532</S> when they had called<S>4341</S> the apostles<S>652</S>, and beaten<S>1194</S> them, they commanded<S>3853</S> that they should<S>2980</S> not<S>3361</S> speak<S>2980</S> in<S>1909</S> the name<S>3686</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> let<S>630</S> them<S>846</S> go<S>630</S>.
And<S>3767</S> they departed<S>4198</S> <S>3303</S> from<S>575</S> the presence<S>4383</S> of the council<S>4892</S>, rejoicing<S>5463</S> that<S>3754</S> they were counted worthy<S>2661</S> to suffer shame<S>818</S> for<S>5228</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>5037</S> daily<S>2250</S> <S>3956</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> in every<S>2596</S> house<S>3624</S>, they ceased<S>3973</S> not<S>3756</S> to teach<S>1321</S> and<S>2532</S> preach<S>2097</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
